scripts.link-shared: cd ./dist/@my-project/shared && npm link && cd ./../../../../plugin/plugin && npm link @my-project/shared
scripts.link-build: cd ./dist/@my-project/build && npm link && cd ./../../../../plugin/plugin && npm link @my-project/build
scripts.link: npm run link-build && npm run link-shared
scripts.build-plugin: npm run link && cd ../plugin/plugin && npm run build && cd ../../@my-project
